A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They made the trailer look like it was going to fulfill so many expectations for a great continuation of the Star Wars story. Sadly\,  I was severely let down. What Star Wars was\, seems like it will never be the same especially in light of the upcoming Solo movie.
